artist: Engraver: Dominique Sornique; Artist: After Charles-Nicolas Cochin  II
description: within a frame a group of people on the steps of a building; pillars left and right; pediment of another building in distance center; people sitting or lying on steps; woman in center pleading with man seated at left
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

in plate in black upper right corner of frame: [Lib. 6]; below image in plate in black: [C.N. Cochin filius inv.    D. Sornique sculpt.]; in pencil on sheet: [1-287]
title: The Plague in Athens
